alert.note: Alert for Coastal Collier County; Inland Collier County; Inland Miami-Dade County; Mainland Monroe (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 25 at 9:04PM EDT by NWS Miami
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Collier and northern Mainland Monroe Counties through 945 PM EDT... At 904 PM EDT, National Weather Service meteorologists were tracking a strong thunderstorm capable of producing a funnel cloud 8 miles northwest of Big Cypress National Preserve, or 16 miles northeast of Everglades City, moving southwest at 10 mph. HAZARD...Funnel clouds and winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Funnel clouds occasionally touch down and produce tornadoes or waterspouts. Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Chokoloskee, Everglades City, Plantation Island, Loop Road Ee Center, Carnestown, Copeland, Big Cypress National Preserve, South Blocks Golde, Fakahatchee Strand State Preserve, Picayune Strand State Forest, Miles City, Jerome and Deep Lake. FUNNEL CLOUD...POSSIBLE MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: These winds can down small tree limbs and branches, and blow around unsecured small objects. Seek shelter in a safe building until the storm passes. Funnel clouds occasionally touch down and produce tornadoes or waterspouts. Move indoors and stay away from windows.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Collier County; Inland Collier County; Inland Miami-Dade County; Mainland Monroe
